message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The symptoms, physical exam findings, and colonoscopy results suggest ulcerative colitis. Mesalamine is a first-line treatment for mild to moderate ulcerative colitis. Azathioprine is used as a steroid-sparing agent in ulcerative colitis but is not a first-line treatment. Total parenteral nutrition is not indicated for mild to moderate ulcerative colitis.
